ti:edition.ti:label: Quod Deterius Potiori Insidiari Soleat
ti:edition.ti:description: Philo Judaeus. Cohn, Leonard, editor. Opera quae supersunt, Volume 1. Berlin: Reimer, 1896.

ti:translation.ti:label: Quod Deterius Potiori Insidiari Soleat
ti:translation.ti:description: Philo of Alexandria, "A TREATISE ON THE PRINCIPLE THAT THE WORSE IS ACCUSTOMED TO BE ALWAYS PLOTTING AGAINST THE BETTER," translator: Charles Duke Yonge (George Bell and Sons, London, 1854)
